::Prowl/Firearm::

Prowl shruggs. "I'm not sure, let's get him out of here."

He spins around as Firearm lands behind him, an awed look on his face.

"What in the pit is that thing?!" the Maximal officer exclaims, 
meaning Oblitertron.

"The Alliance gestalt," Prowl replies, "Help me get Dinobot up."

Firearm nods, walking over to Dinobot and simply lifting him to his 
shoulder, grunting a bit under the weight.

"I'll take him back to base," he says, "Get the others out."

Prowl nods as Firearm flies off, looking back at Foxfingers. "Ok, 
let's get the others out of here," he says, "Are there any more 
injured?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> FoxFingers watches the action as it unfolds he sees Dinobot on the 
> ground and Prowl trying to help him . It brought back memories of 
his 
> life before he met Veratis and LadyHawk. A life he'd never know 
> again. He figured that someone else would be better suited to move 
> Hot Rod so he scampered in the direction of Prowl. "Is your friene 
> functioning?" He yelled at the top of his vocal unit as he ran to 
> help.
